attributes.action: make parlimentary attendance compulsory for MPs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is all too often that we find the house of commons empty beyond belief. In any other job, attendance is not optional, and the fact that hardly anybody turns up is tantamount to earning money without having to turn up to work.

This absenteeism can be equated to be as scandalous as the recent 'MP expenses', which our PM has failed to put into law.

For the above reasons, we need to have our MPs attendance in the house of commons made compulsory.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
